header.rec_loc: A car journey from a shop in Preston to another shop in Preston
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Directions, shopping, travelling, moving house process/survey done on the house, renovation of areas, childhood, blankets/ other products in the shop, babies/ pregnancy, drinking water, college, youth, films/ cinema, jobs, degrees, university, drugs, different areas, traffic,
header.activity: Family talk during a car journey to mother care (shop)/ in the shop/ going home from the shop,
header.conv_type: Discussing., explaining, making arrangements, telling jokes
